name: Starbit
printed_effect:
This Starbit gets +2 {attack} for each {water} Enchanting it.
You can Nexus up to {water}{water}. When this Starbit has
7 or more {attack} during your Main Phase you must
either destroy it or Special Ascend it to
Starbit-Supernova from your hand or deck.
